name: Daniel Lowd
content: Daniel Lowd Daniel Lowd E-mail: lowd at uoregon dot edu Office: 262 Deschutes Hall Phone: 541-346-4154 Fax: 541-346-5373 Mailing Address: Department of Computer Science University of Oregon, Eugene, OR 97403 I am an Professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Oregon. More info: https://lowd.cc My research interests include learning and inference with probabilistic graphical models, adversarial machine learning, and statistical relational machine learning. You can also find me on BlueSky (@lowd.bsky.social), Twitter (@dlowd) and Mastodon (@lowd@sigmoid.social).
